about_the_game:
Davy’s Debris is a fast-paced action beat ‘em up where you pick up trash. Launch your long arms to grab your enemies and fling them across the screen on your mission to clean all the trash off the beach.

Play as Davy, an adorable orange cube of a robot with a nose for danger,

Clean ‘em Up!

The fast paced combat will keep you on your toes as you attempt to throw out all the trash without being defeated by the hordes of enemies

Enemies

Fight off a wide variety of trash-based enemies. All kinds of trash has become sentient and threatens to overtake the world. Tires with their dangerous dash attacks, Soda cups with their deadly streams of soda, discarded appliances like microwaves, and much much more.
